deployment_relevant_files: ./docker-compose.yml (references AWS ECR image; awslogs logging driver)
./.github/workflows/jekyll-gh-pages.yml (GitHub Actions workflow building/pushing Docker image to ECR and running `terraform init/apply`)
architectural_resources: Containerized web/API application (Express) listening on port 3000 (from ./app.js)
AWS ECR repository (image pushed to `${AWS_ACCOUNT_ID}.dkr.ecr.${AWS_REGION}.amazonaws.com/${ECR_REPO_NAME}:${IMAGE_TAG}` from .github/workflows/jekyll-gh-pages.yml and docker-compose.yml)
AWS ECS service/task implied by awslogs config and log group `/ecs/hello-world` (from ./docker-compose.yml)
CI/CD pipeline via GitHub Actions using AWS credentials (from .github/workflows/jekyll-gh-pages.yml)
Terraform-based infrastructure deployment is intended, but Terraform *.tf source files are not present in this repository (only Terraform init/validate output logs under ./Terraform/)
